feature.label: Eclipse Runner Feature
feature.description:
The Eclipse Runner plugin improves the way how one can execute launch configurations from inside the Eclipse IDE. The plugin adds a new "Runner" view, which allows the user to categorize, bookmark and organize launch configurations in groups. Launch configurations can be executed directly from the view by double clicking on the icon of the launch configuration.
- Eclipse Runner @ Github: https://github.com/zaunerc/eclipserunnerplugin
- Eclipse Runner @ Eclipse Marketplace: https://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/eclipse-runner
- Eclipse Runner P2 update site (always serving latest version): https://dl.bintray.com/zaunerc/p2/eclipserunner/latest
